content.question: Shown above is the slope field for which of the following differential equations?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, negative, open parenthesis, x plus y, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, negative x y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, the negative of x squared, times y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, the negative of, the fraction x over y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, negative x y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
